verses.name: 1 Chronicles 18:5
verses.text: And when the Syrians of Damascus came to help Hadarezer king of Zobah, David slew of the Syrians two and twenty thousand men.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 18:6
verses.text: Then David put garrisons in Syria–damascus; and the Syrians became David’s servants, and brought gifts. Thus the Lord preserved David whithersoever he went.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 18:7
verses.text: And David took the shields of gold that were on the servants of Hadarezer, and brought them to Jerusalem.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 18:8
verses.text: Likewise from Tibhath, and from Chun, cities of Hadarezer, brought David very much brass, wherewith Solomon made the brasen sea, and the pillars, and the vessels of brass.
